conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway rendering with clear floor-to-wall separation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and clean isometric projection; minor perspective flattening on far corners.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout is largely correct, but the wall separating the bedroom from the living room is missing, making it a studio layout rather than a 1-bedroom as per the plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches the 2D plan types (bed, sofa, dining, kitchen island) but orientation of the bed and sofa is rotated 90 degrees.

visual_clarity.notes: Extremely clean aesthetic with consistent materials and no UI text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Missing internal partition wall between the bedroom and living area.
Bed and sofa orientations do not match the 2D floor plan layout.

summary: A high-quality 3D render that captures the overall architectural footprint but fails on a major internal partition wall.
